name: Solid
tagline: A Presentation about SOLID and some other best practices in Software Engineering
body: This is a simple presentation about SOLID and some other best practices in Software Engineering. You can either download it as an archive and open the "Presentation.html" to run it locally or run it online from my blog [here](http://www.harindaka.com/2015/02/writing-solid-code-keeping-it-dry.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
